title: Login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully with correct email and password using Supabase Auth

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input a valid registered email
Input the correct password
Submit the login form
Check the user is redirected to the /dashboard page
Verify JWT token is received from Supabase Auth

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and an error message is shown

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input an unregistered or invalid email
Input an incorrect password
Submit the login form
Verify error message is displayed indicating login failure
Ensure user remains on login page

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users get access only to features allowed by their RBAC roles at UI and API levels

steps.description: Log in as each user role: admin, monev, viewer, program_planner, program_implementer, carbon_specialist
Attempt to access restricted pages and functionality as each role
Verify access is granted or denied according to documented permissions
Check backend API calls fail with authorization error when accessed without permission

title: Dashboard Nasional displays correct aggregate statistics
description: Verify the main national dashboard displays total PS count, total area, RKPS status, and map status accurately

steps.description: Log in as an authorized user
Navigate to the /dashboard page
Verify that total PS count is shown and matches database records
Verify total area and RKPS status statistics are displayed
Check the map status renders and shows locations correctly

title: Filter and search functionality in Data PS Management
description: Verify filtering and searching PS data works correctly and updates results dynamically

steps.description: Log in and navigate to /dashboard/data
Use filter controls with various valid and boundary inputs (e.g., PS status, kabupaten)
Use the search box with keywords including exact match, partial, and case variants
Verify the data table updates correctly according to filters and searches
Verify no irrelevant records appear in results

title: PS Profile Detail tabs functionality
description: Verify that each tab in PS Profile Detail (Ringkasan, Kelembagaan, Dokumen, Peta, Galeri, Kegiatan, Catatan) loads and displays correct data

steps.description: Navigate to a valid PS record detail page
Click on each tab one by one
Verify content loads for each tab without errors
Verify displayed data matches expected values from database

title: Excel Import successful flow and error handling
description: Verify Excel file upload, preview and import completes successfully for valid data, and errors are handled properly for invalid data

steps.description: Log in as admin or monev
Navigate to /dashboard/upload
Upload a valid Excel file containing correct PS data
Verify preview displays accurate parsed data
Confirm import
Verify records are saved in database and reflected in UI
Upload an Excel file with invalid or missing mandatory fields
Verify validation errors are displayed clearly and import is blocked

title: Kabupaten Management data rendering and filtering
description: Verify detailed statistics and data views per kabupaten render correctly and support filtering

steps.description: Navigate to kabupaten management section
Verify statistics for each kabupaten are accurate and complete
Apply filters (e.g., kabupaten name, status)
Verify filtered data displays correctly without errors

title: Internationalization support for Bahasa Indonesia and Chinese Traditional
description: Verify the UI language switches correctly between Bahasa Indonesia and Chinese Traditional using next-intl without layout breaking

steps.description: Navigate to any page
Switch language setting to Bahasa Indonesia
Verify all textual UI elements translate to Bahasa Indonesia correctly
Switch language setting to Chinese Traditional
Verify all textual UI elements translate to Chinese Traditional correctly
Verify UI styling and layout remain consistent on language switch

title: Performance test: page load under 2 seconds
description: Verify that all main pages including login, dashboard, data PS, and profile detail load within 2 seconds under normal load

steps.description: Navigate to login page and measure load time
Confirm login page load time is less than 2 seconds
Log in and navigate to /dashboard, measure load time
Confirm dashboard page load time is less than 2 seconds
Navigate to /dashboard/data and measure table load time
Confirm data PS page load time is less than 2 seconds
Open a PS profile detail page and measure load time
Confirm profile detail page load time is less than 2 seconds

title: Security test: data encryption at rest and in transit
description: Verify that all sensitive data is encrypted in storage and during communication between client and server

steps.description: Capture network traffic during login and data fetch
Verify all communication uses HTTPS with AES or better encryption
Verify database storage for sensitive data fields is encrypted according to standards

title: User Profile Management editing and saving
description: Verify users can update and save their profile information correctly with validation

steps.description: Login and navigate to user profile page
Edit profile fields such as name, contact, and language preferences
Save changes
Verify changes are saved and reflected immediately
Attempt to input invalid data (e.g., invalid email format)
Verify validation errors prevent saving invalid input

title: Dashboard statistics and analytics charts rendering
description: Verify that statistics dashboard visualizations render correctly with accurate data

steps.description: Navigate to the statistics dashboard
Verify all charts render without errors
Verify chart data matches underlying dataset
Apply date range or other filter changes and verify charts update accordingly

title: Unauthorized API access blocked
description: Verify that all API endpoints enforce row-level and role-based security, blocking unauthorized access

steps.description: Using an authenticated user with limited role, attempt to access API endpoints outside allowed permissions
Verify API returns HTTP 403 Forbidden or equivalent
Attempt direct database access to disallowed rows via API and verify security enforcement
